title: Substitute Expression for $$x$$
text: To implement substitution, rewrite the second equation in terms of $$x$$ and substitute for the $$x$$ in the first equation.

title: Solve for $$y$$
text: To solve for $$y$$, factor the expression and apply the zero product property.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: To solve for $$x$$, plug $$y=3$$ into the first equation of $$x=3y-10$$.
